nodes.text: The E-wing escort fighter was a starfighter manufactured by FreiTek Incorporated, that existed during the Imperial Era. One E-wing was among the starships on sale at the Imperial auction on Mygeeto prior to the Battle of Endor, in 4 ABY.
An E-wing escort fighter appeared in the 2017 non-canon LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures episode "The Embersteel Blade," directed by Michael Hegner and Jeppe Sandholt.

The E-wing escort starfighter first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity, in the 1992 comic Dark Empire 3, written by Tom Veitch. After the initial appearance, the E-wing became a common sight in Legends literature and media.
Sometime between 32 ABY and 34 ABY, during the Cold War, Baron Paw Maccon owned a ship similar to an E-wing as part of his starfighter collection, located inside his palace on Cato Neimoidia.
